content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
No new structures have been successfully created on the map. Although the agent repeatedly attempted to place a Lab at (0.5, 2.5), all such attempts failed due to inventory and resource shortages. Pre‐existing furnace entities (an iron smelting furnace at Position(x=5.0, y=5.0) and a copper furnace at Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0)) were identified and used for smelting operations, but none of these were built or modified by the agent during these steps.

ERROR TIPS
• Errors in using get_entities:
 – Avoid passing unsupported keyword arguments (such as “radius”) or extra positional parameters.
 – Adhere strictly to the function’s expected signature to prevent TypeErrors.
• Lab placement and crafting issues:
 – Ensure that the required Lab item is present in the inventory before attempting placement.
 – Verify that returned collections from entity retrieval are not None before iterating.
 – Confirm that all sub-ingredients for Lab crafting (for example, iron-gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, copper-cables, and copper-plates) are available and producible via the correct crafting or smelting methods.
• Resource management:
 – Regularly check resource counts and production outputs to meet the dependencies for complex items.
 – Review the complete ingredient chain for Lab production to preempt failures due to missing prerequisites.
